name: Barbarian
description: Barbarians are fierce warriors driven by primal rage and raw physical power. They thrive in chaos and rely on instinct over strategy.
real_world_analogues: people who act first and think later
those who thrive under pressure through sheer force of will

name: Bard
description: Bards are versatile performers, storytellers, and diplomats who use charm, wit, and creativity to influence others and solve problems.
real_world_analogues: people who talk their way out of anything

name: Cleric
description: Clerics are devoted servants of a higher cause or belief system. They heal, protect, and guide others through faith and conviction.
personality_markers: authoritative on matters of faith or ethics
real_world_analogues: therapists guided by strong ethical framework
people whose identity is defined by service to others

name: Druid
description: Druids are guardians of the natural world who draw power from nature. They are adaptable, observant, and deeply connected to cycles and systems.
real_world_analogues: people who prefer the outdoors to offices
those who see patterns in complex systems

name: Fighter
description: Fighters are disciplined combat specialists who master weapons and tactics through training and dedication. They are reliable, practical, and effective.
real_world_analogues: people who just get things done

name: Monk
description: Monks are masters of self-discipline who harness inner energy through meditation, training, and ascetic practice. They value self-improvement and inner harmony.
real_world_analogues: those who pursue mastery through practice and repetition

name: Paladin
description: Paladins are holy warriors bound by sacred oaths. They combine martial prowess with unwavering moral conviction and lead by example.
real_world_analogues: military officers who lead from the front
people who cannot let injustice stand

name: Ranger
description: Rangers are skilled trackers and hunters who operate on the fringes. They are self-reliant, observant, and comfortable working alone.
real_world_analogues: people who notice everything but say little

name: Rogue
description: Rogues are cunning, resourceful operators who rely on skill, stealth, and exploiting vulnerabilities rather than direct confrontation.
real_world_analogues: people who find shortcuts and loopholes
con artists with hearts of gold

name: Sorcerer
description: Sorcerers wield innate magical power that comes from within rather than from study. Their abilities are instinctive and tied to their identity.
real_world_analogues: people with raw charisma who never had formal training
those whose talent feels like destiny

name: Warlock
description: Warlocks gain power through pacts with powerful entities. They are ambitious seekers of forbidden knowledge who made deals to get ahead.
real_world_analogues: people who made Faustian bargains for success
those who work within morally gray systems to gain power
corporate climbers who know where the bodies are buried

name: Wizard
description: Wizards acquire power through rigorous study, research, and intellectual mastery. They are scholars who believe knowledge is the ultimate power.
real_world_analogues: analysts who need all the data before deciding
those who believe every problem has an intellectual solution
